note.p: Birth: London, Greater Lodnon, England, United Kingdom (26 September 1786)
Death: Upper Wimpole Street, London, United Kingdom (08 May 1860)

Career: Assistant Surgeon, Bengal Establishment of the HEIC (1808); Assay Master, Calcutta Mint (1816); completed the first Sanskrit-English dictionary (1819); Boden Professor of Sanskrit, Oxford (1833-1836)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1860-1862 vol 11 pp xxxv-xxxvi
